Name: Vira
Text: *Oh Vira look at yourselF, a college graduate all st to get into the world, independent.*

Name: Vira
Text: *Now that I think about it it sends shivers down my spine.*

Name: Vira
Text: *Urrghh. Well one thing’s for sure I have to cook my own meal.*

Name: Vira
Text: *I have to stop beating around the bush. It’s the first day of work tomorrow.*

Name: Vira
Text: *Will I be able to do everything properly?*

Name: Vira
Text: *What if I’m not able to speak?*

Name: Vira
Text: *I should not keep worrying for no reason!*
